name: KAREN SEES 👁️
description:
KAREN SEES - You play as night guard Bob who faces chaos erupting at his mall when a bloodthirsty KAREN, armed with a knife and vicious words, breaks in looking for the manager!

GAMEPLAY: Taking place in a giant, spooky shopping mall at night, you must find and destroy the complaints plastered all over the mall using security cameras and stealth to survive through the night. Karen is an enraged, fast and wreckles woman armed with vicious words as well as her knife with an AI designed to be as demeaning and horrifying as humanly possible.  👁️


FEATURES: Survive the night by using cameras and other tricks to avoid getting caught, explore the giant mall with your choice of difficulty, randomized note locations each time you lose to the vicious Karen-AI. A short, terrifying story and more!
